About Us

Who We Are

Xaloo Technologies specializes in providing solutions and services for a wide range of industrial automation systems. We focus on Programmable Logic Controllers (PLCs), SCADA systems, industrial communications, process instruments, drives, motors, and actuators.

We serve various industries, including mining, pharmaceuticals, telecommunications, water and wastewater, and food and beverage sectors. Our engineers and technicians have vast experience, handling projects, system upgrades, and urgent breakdowns with swift response times.

Our technical team's competence in fieldbus systems is outstanding. Profibus, one of the most widely used bus systems in the country, has posed challenges for many clients. With our expertise and diagnostic tools like Profitrace and COMBricks, we’ve consistently helped clients rectify issues and restore their Profibus networks to proper installation standards.

We also supply a wide range of industrial automation products. Visit our services, products, and projects pages to learn more about what we offer and the experience we’ve gained over the years.

Our Vision

Customer satisfaction through excellent response times and first-class service.

Our Mission

To stay at the forefront of industrial communications and automation trends, delivering value-added solutions with a quality engineering approach tailored to customer needs.

Our Objectives

Timely response to service calls and continuous in-service training for our staff.

The Founder

Gasemotho Phalalo is the founder of Xaloo Technologies, an automation company established in Botswana in 2010. With over a decade of experience in the automation and control engineering industry, Gasemotho has led the engineering team at Xaloo Technologies, delivering innovative solutions to a range of industries.

He previously worked at Siemens Botswana in the automation and drives department. Gasemotho holds a BEng (Hons) in Automation and Control from Manchester Metropolitan University (UK).

He is a Certified Profibus Engineer (Idxonline, SA), Certified Profibus Installer (Automation Systems Centre, UK), Certified AS-Interface Engineer (Automation Systems Centre, UK), and a Certified Fiber Optic Technician (Triple Play, SA).

His strong educational background and hands-on experience have been instrumental in founding and growing Xaloo Technologies.
